sentences.en: ...Celtic stories of cauldrons and enchanted vessels.
sentences.cn: …凯尔特人关于神锅和魔法器皿的故事。

sentences.en: Added a new enchant shield recipe to trainers that increases resilience.
sentences.cn: 训练师现在教授增加新的韧性的盾牌附魔.

sentences.en: At this repast, Mr. Chuckster exerted his utmost abilities to enchant his entertainers.
sentences.cn: 在吃点心的时候, 查尔斯先生竭力卖弄他的本领,媚悦他的东道主.

sentences.en: BE you let me enchant a direction.
Enchant Bracer - Brawn : Permanently enchants bracers to increase Strength by 12.
sentences.cn: 使一副 护腕 永久的获得+12力量的效果.

sentences.en: Enchant Bracer - Major Defense : Permanently enchants bracers to increase your defense by 8.
sentences.cn: 使一副护腕永久的获得防御技能+8的效果.

sentences.en: Enchant Bracer - Stats : Permanently enchants bracers to increase all stats by 4.
sentences.cn: 使一副护腕永久的获得+4所有属性的效果.

sentences.en: Enchant Cloak - Major Armor : Permanently a cloak toa 120 additional armor.
sentences.cn: 使一件披风永久的获得+120护甲值的效果.

sentences.en: Enchant Weapon - Major Intellect: Permanently enchant a melee weapon to grant + 30 Intellect.
sentences.cn: 使一件武器永久的获得伤害+7的效果.

sentences.en: Enchant? I'm sure. My name's Stone.
sentences.cn: 开心 吗 ?我想是吧. 我的名字是史东.

sentences.en: Fine cashmere fashions are of superB quality and enchant everyone.
sentences.cn: 高级羊绒时装,超高品质,令人神往.

sentences.en: I was enchanted by the way she smiled.
sentences.cn: 她微笑时的样子让我着迷。

sentences.en: It will be possible to enchant weapons and armor with runes.
sentences.cn: 工匠可以在武器和防具上附加上古诗歌或者文字的魔法属性.

sentences.en: Percy's enchant-ment with orchids dates back to 1951.
sentences.cn: 珀西对兰花的痴迷可以回溯到1951年。

sentences.en: The spectacle of the aurora may appear to dazzle and enchant the observer's eye.
sentences.cn: 极光的壮丽景色的出现,会使观察者为之眩目和迷惑.

sentences.en: Would you cry bitterly, be like to enchant an oneself?
sentences.cn: 你会痛哭流涕, 就像迷失了自己 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can however enchant for it with ease.
sentences.cn: 但是你可以通过附魔来提升.

words.tran_cn: 夺人心魂地；可爱地，迷人地
巫师，行妖术的人；魔法师

trans.tran_en: to attract sb strongly and make them feel very interested, excited, etc.

trans.tran_cn: 使心醉，使迷惑，用魔法迷惑
